**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 193 2.0 **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** varies --- You dance, Striding up to half your Speed. At either the start or end of your Stride, you create an area of magical darkness in a 10-foot burst centered on your location. This area is filled with magical darkness that works the same way as that created by a [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) spell of the same level. When you create the darkness, attempt a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check to dance, with a standard DC for your level, to determine the duration of the darkness. **Critical Success** 1 minute
**Success** 2 rounds
**Failure** 1 round
name: Dance of Darkness
